body:
Totally aware that ruqqus has just come back up - just wondering if the dark mode is resetting for other individuals and is a byproduct issue of ruqqus coming back somehow or if it is entirely on my end. 

Edit: I use the unofficial ruqqus app - maybe that is why there is an issue.
body_html:
Totally aware that ruqqus has just come back up - just wondering if the dark mode is resetting for other individuals and is a byproduct issue of ruqqus coming back somehow or if it is entirely on my end.

Edit: I use the unofficial ruqqus app - maybe that is why there is an issue.
